channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 2d50f159-7b96-4f1e-8fc7-fee6957ab7cc
Display name: Azure Monitor Pipeline Reader
Description: Read Azure Monitor Pipeline resources, including pipeline configurations and monitoring features.
Link: https://management.azure.com/2d50f159-7b96-4f1e-8fc7-fee6957ab7cc?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 679dc20a-52e8-4ac0-a23c-3b557dfb1e24
Display name: Azure Monitor Pipeline Contributor
Description: Manage Azure Monitor Pipeline resources, providing full read and write access to pipeline configurations and monitoring features.
Link: https://management.azure.com/679dc20a-52e8-4ac0-a23c-3b557dfb1e24?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Graph app permission
item.description:

Display name: EngagementConversation.Read.All
Description: Read all Viva Engage conversations
Link: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/directoryRoleTemplates/2c495153-cd0e-41b4-9980-3bcecf1ca22f
